Description: Fragment of marble monumental Greek inscription; splintered away on all sides, except Greek inscription face.
Curator's comments: Found in the area of the pylon of the temple precinct of Amun-Ra (Great Temenos) (Petrie 1886, p. 28) See also Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 114
Bibliographic references: Inscription / The Collection of Ancient Greek Inscriptions in the British Museum (1086)
Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXI, no. 10)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (no. 10, pl. 36,2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BA.14)
